"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e16c4d96-903d-4a1b-a630-0dca8d124d07#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A vér mikroszkópos képe</string>
            <string language="en">Microscopic picture of blood</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroskopische Abbildung des Bluts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image microscopique de sang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato microscópico do sangue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine microscopica di anima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικροσκοπική εικόνα του αίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro microscópico de la sangre</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A vér mikroszkópos képéről készült rajz</string>
            <string language="en">drawing about microscopic picture of blood</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">vér,  vérplazma,  vörösvérsejt,  fehérvérsejt,  vérlemezke,  keringés,  anyagszállítás,  </string>
            <string language="en">blood, blood plasma, blood corpuscle, white blood cell, blood plaque, circulation, transport of materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen über mikroskopische Abbildung des Bluts</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dessin au sujet de l'image microscopique du sang</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenhar sobre o retrato microscópico do sangue</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dissipando circa l'immagine microscopica di 
anima</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχεδιασμός για τη μικροσκοπική εικόνα του αίματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el trazar sobre el cuadro microscópico de la 
sangre</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blut, Blutplasma, Blutteilchen, weiße Blutzelle, 
Blutplakette, Zirkulation, Transport der Materialien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sang, plasma sanguin, corpuscule de sang, cellule de 
sang blanche, plaque de sang, circulation, transport des matériaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sangue, plasma de sangue, corpuscle do sangue, pilha de 
sangue branca, chapa do sangue, circulação, transporte dos 
materiais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anima, plasma sanguigno, corpuscolo di anima, cellula 
di anima bianca, piastra di anima, circolazione, trasporto dei 
materiali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αίμα, πλάσμα αίματος, αιμοσφαίριο αίματος, λευκό κύτταρο 
αίματος, πινακίδα αίματος, κυκλοφορία, μεταφορά των υλικών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sangre, plasma de sangre, corpúsculo de la sangre, 
célula de sangre blanca, placa de la sangre, circulación, transporte
de materiales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
